description: Magnum ammuniton, developed from early handgun hunting efforts and popularized by law enforcement usage.  It is more powerful than common pistol ammo. Full metal jacketed bullets offer reduced fouling, better reliability, and slightly improved penetration compared to plain lead.

Magnum ammunition, developed from early handgun hunting efforts and popularized by law enforcement usage.  It is more powerful than common pistol ammo.  Jacketed Hollow Points are defensive/duty projectiles that are more destructive to tissue than plain ball ammunition, and slightly reduce overpenetration concerns.
